titleStmt.title: To the supream authority of the nation the Parliament of the common-wealth of England the humble petition of Mary Countess of Sterling, and John Blount her husband.
titleStmt.author: Stirling, Mary Vanlore Alexander, Countess of, d. ca. 1660.
Blount, John.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
